Company Overview.Name: Insecticides India Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Manufacturing of agrochemicals (technicals and formulations) and biological and household products. They cater to the Indian market, selling directly to consumers and supplying technicals/formulations to other formulation companies.  They also export to over 22 countries.
Company Overview.Market Position: Has a wide dealer and distribution network with 380 SKUs, 6,000+ distributor connections, and 70,000+ dealer and retailer connections.  Recently launched four new products (Hachiman, Oxim, Tory, and Shinwa) to bolster market share.  Has six formulation plants, two technical synthesis plants, and one biological manufacturing plant.

Key Points: Product Wise Revenue Mix (FY22 vs FY21): Insecticides (53% vs 58%), Herbicides (33% vs 31%), Fungicides (11% vs 9%), PGR/Biologicals (3% vs 2%)
55% of revenue from Maharatna products, 45% from other branded products
Geography Wise Revenue Split (FY22): South (36%), East (22%), West (21%), North (21%)
Key brands: Pulsor, Green Label, Hercules, Kunoichi, Dominant, Lethal Gold, and KK Pro. Brand ambassadors: Suniel Shetty and Ajay Devgn.
Export revenue: 9% in FY22 (vs 4% in FY21)
JV with OAT Agrio Company Limited (Japan) for innovation and marketing.
Tie-ups with Nissan Chemical Corporation (Japan), Momentive (USA), and Nihon Nohyaku Company Limited (Japan).
Ban on four pesticides in August 2018 (mitigated by new product additions).
R&D as a percentage of revenue: <1% in FY22.
Company has reduced debt and is almost debt-free.
Poor sales growth of 10.5% over the past five years.
Low return on equity of 10.1% over the last 3 years.
Low dividend payout of 9.43% of profits over the last 3 years.
